1: <pb/><e>Ayic sb'itan jun b'it tic vin̈ cuchb'um yic b'it, a yamc'ab' ay sch'an̈al sc'anchaji. Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, il in coti. Tz'el vav yuj yaelal tzin ic'ani. Cha ab' in lesal.</t>
2: <t>Ato b'aj slajvic'och sti' lum luum tic tzin avaj d'ayach, tz'el yip in pixan svab'i. Ic' in q'ue d'a yib'an̈ junoc nivan q'ueen yic tzin colchaji.</t>
3: <t>A ach ayachoch in colnab'iloc. Icha junoc cuartel aj d'ayin, tzin a col d'a eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin.</t>
4: <t>In gana tzin cajnaj d'a a cajnub' d'a masanil tiempo. In gana tzin c'ub'ej in b'a d'a yalan̈ a vach'c'olal, icha noc' yunetac caxlan̈ d'a yalan̈ sc'axil snun.</t>
5: <t>Ach in Diosal, ab'nac tas in ti' vac'nac d'ayach, ix ac' in macb'en yed' eb' ay elc'och d'ay.</t>
6: <t>Najatocab' tzutej in q'uinal a in rey in tic. Nivanocab' ab'il svila'</t>
7: <t>yic svac'an yajalil d'a ichan̈. Tan̈vej in yed' a vach'c'olal, yujto tz'eln̈ejc'och tas tzala'.</t>
8: <t>Icha chi' ol ach in b'itej d'a masanil tiempo. Junjun c'u ol in c'anab'ajan b'aj vac'nac in ti' chi' d'ayach.</t>
